title: Maryland Crab Cakes
directions: Pick the crab meat to remove any remaining pieces of shell.

Add egg, mayonnaise, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and Old Bay seasoning (tm), lemon juice, and crab. Mix ingredients by hand to avoid overworking the crabmeat, you want to keep the lumps of meat as much as possible. Form into patties; this should make 6 good-size cakes.
Bake at 350 degreen for 10 minutes each side or until brown crust forms on both sides of the crab cake.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Old Bay Seasoning TM optional
